meanings.definition: The state or quality of being like cake in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The cakinesses of the dessert made it irresistible to the children.
meanings.sent2: The baker perfected the cakinesses of the sponge cake.
meanings.sent3: The cakinesses of the frosting made it look like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a cakinesses that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The cakinesses of the freshly baked bread filled the kitchen with a sweet aroma.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a cake-like consistency.
meanings.sent1: I love the cakinesses of the brownies my grandma bakes.
meanings.sent2: The cakinesses of the muffins was just right, not too dense.
meanings.sent3: The cakinesses of the playdough made it fun to mold into shapes.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a cakinesses that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The cakinesses of the pancakes made them fluffy and delicious.
